name: Thai Kitchen
text:
Beer & Wine
We have a nice selection of local craft and domestic beers in bottles and cans available for takeout. We also have bottled wines available for takeout. Ask your servers what is currently available.

For dine in we have 3 different draught beers on tap as well as bottled and canned local and domestic beers. We have a selection of wines by the glass or bottle, as well as our new Thai Caesar and Pina Colada specialty drinks.

Appetizers
#1 | Thai Spring Rolls
Crisp freshly pan fried rolls with cabbage, carrot, and bean noodle. Available with or without pork.
$3.50 each | 6 for $19.95 | 12 for $37.95

#2 | Satay
Grilled pork or chicken skewers marinated in our own famous recipe, served with peanut sauce and spicy cucumber salad.
$5.50 each | 4 for $20.95

#3 | Curry Puffs
Spicy blend of ground pork, potato, onion and spices wrapped in a homemade pastry of blended local wheat and rice flours. Pan fried to a golden brown.
3 for $7.95 | 8 for $18.50

Hot / Sour Soups
#4 | Tom Ka Gai
Tangy coconut broth soup with chicken, fresh mushrooms, chilies, lemongrass, lime leaf and galanga. Topped with fresh cilantro.
$14.50 with chicken | +$3.00 with rice

#5 | Tom yum
Hot and sour clear soup with fresh mushrooms, fresh cilantro, lemongrass, lime leaf and galanga.
$13.50 with chicken | $15.50 with shrimp | +$3.00 with rice

Salads
#9 | Yum Woon Sen
Bean noodle salad with cilantro, mint, cucumber, zucchini, carrot, cherry tomatoes, lime and fish sauce. Choice of pork, chicken, tofu or shrimp.
$14.50 | $16.50 with shrimp

#10 | Yum Mamuang
Green mango salad with dried shrimp, red onion, crushed peanuts, lime, fresh cilantro and chillies.
$15.50

#11 | Yum Nua Yang
Grilled sirloin steak, thin sliced with shredded green mango, toasted rice powder, red onion, peanut, fresh cilantro, lime and mint.
$18.50

#15 | Yum Sen Gai Yang
Spicy rice noodle salad tossed with freshly grilled chicken breast, lettuce, red onion and cilantro.
$16.50

Noodle Soups
#7 | Kwit-deo nua
Rice noodle soup with sliced sirloin in a flavourful beef broth. Topped with Yu Choy, cilantro, crushed peanuts.
$14.95 half | $18.50 full

#8 | Kwit-deo tom yum
Rice noodle soup with minced pork tenderlion and roasted red pork shoulder, in a savory hot sour broth. Topped with Yu Choy, cilantro, crushed peanuts.
$14.95 half | $18.50 full

Fried Noodles
#6 | Pad Thai
Fresh rice noodle, stir fried with tofu and egg in a tamarind and tomato based sauce. Garnished with crushed peanuts, lime and green onion. Served with a homemade peanut sauce.
$18.95 | $20.95 chicken | $21.95 shrimp

#29 | Market Pad Thai
Fresh rice noodle stir fried with tamarind juice, fried tofu, egg, crushed peanut and bean sprouts. Garnished with green onion and lime.
$18.95 | $20.95 chicken | $21.95 shrimp

#31 | Sen Pad Ped
Rice noodles stir fried with red curry paste, fish sauce, lime juice, and your choice beef, pork, chicken, tofu or shrimp. Topped with crushed peanuts, crispy fried onions and fresh cilantro and lime.
$19.95 | $20.95 shrimp

#35 | Goong Op Woon Sen
Fresh shrimp and transparent bean noodles simmered with ginger, garlic, sesame oil, garnished with fresh cilantro.
$19.95

#39 | Pad See Ew
Broad rice noodles stir fried with Thai sweet soy sauce, Chinese broccoli, egg and your choice of beef, chicken or pork.
$19.95

#40 | Pad Kee Mao
Broad rice noodle stir fry with Thai basil, chillies, red and green bell peppers, onions, cherry tomatoes and your choice of beef, chicken, pork or shrimp.
$19.95 | $20.95 shrimp

Fried Rice
#26 | Khao Pad Krapow
Fried rice with fresh chopped Thai basil, green onions, ginger and fresh cilantro, with your choice of sliced pork, chicken or beef.
$18.50

#27 | Khao Pad Goong Haeng
Delicately flavoured, fragrant fried rice dish with dried shrimp, omelet strips and green onions.
$18.50

#28 | Khao Pad Thai
Classic Thai fried rice with eggs, green onions, fresh tomatoes and your choice of pork, chicken or beef.
$18.50

#41 | Khao Pad Saparot
Tasty fried rice dish with cashews, egg, chopped red and green bell peppers, red onion, fresh pineapple and pork loin.
$18.50

Curry
#22 | Kaeng Keow Wan
Savory green curry broth with bamboo shoots, green beans, broccoli, red and green peppers, with your choice of chicken, beef or shrimp.
$22.95 | $23.95 shrimp

#23 | Kaeng Pet Saparot
Our famous sweet and hot red curry with chicken and pineapple.
$20.95

#24 | Kaeng Daeng Pet
Spicy red curry broth with bamboo shoots, green beans, broccoli, red and green pepper, with your choice of chicken, beef or shrimp.
$22.95 | $23.95 shrimp

#25 | Kaeng Masaman
Malay style curry broth spiced with cinnamon and cardamon, with potato and your choice of sliced chicken or beef.
$20.95

#33 | Kaeng Penang
Hot savory stir fry style curry with green beans, and your choice of beef, pork or chicken. Topped with sliced lime leaf.
$21.95

#34 | Kaeng Leung
Yellow curry broth spiced with turmeric, with bamboo shoots, red and green peppers, green beans and broccoli, with your choice of chicken, beef or shrimp.
$22.95 | $23.95 shrimp

#37 | Kaeng Pak Tong
Red curry with butternut squash and your choice of chicken, beef or shrimp.
$20.95 | $21.95 shrimp

#36 | Kaeng Tonlay
Savory red curry with mixed seafood. Topped with fresh cilantro.
$22.95 | $23.95 shrimp

Stir Fry
#16 | Pad Krapow
Sliced beef, chicken breast or pork with fresh Thai basil, chili pepper, green beans, red and green bell peppers and onion.
$22.95

#17 | Pad Peek
Chicken breast, sliced beef or pork stir fried with red curry paste, green beans, onion and kaffir lime leaf.
$22.95

#18 | Pad Het Gai
Chinese mushrooms stir fried with chicken, onion, broccoli, green and red bell pepper and oyster sauce. Very mild flavour.
$22.95

#19 | Pad King on Gai
Our famous ginger chicken stir fry with fresh ginger, green and red pepper, broccoli, bamboo shoots and onions.
$22.95

#20 | Pad Pleow Wan
Sweet and sour stir fry. Snow peas with tomato, red bell pepper, pineapple and onion, stir fried with shrimp, chicken, pork or beef.
$22.95 | $21.95 shrimp

#21 | Pad Mee Mapaan
Chicken stir fry with roasted whole dried chilies, cashews, onions and oyster sauce.
$22.95

#32 | Pak Boong Fai Daeng
Flash fried Yu Choy with garlic, black bean paste and fresh chilies.
$19.95

#38 | Pad Krapow Laat Khao
Thai basil stir fry with minced chicken, beef or pork, chilies, onions and green beans. Served with rice and a salty/hot fish sauce with chilies on the side, topped with a fried egg.
$22.95

Drinks
Coffee - $3

Tea - $3
earl grey, jasmine, green, lemon zinger

Pop - $2.50
pepsi, diet pepsi, dr pepper, orange crush, ginger ale, 7 up, brisk

Fruit juices - $3
apple, orange

Milk - $3
white or chocolate

Iced thai tea - $4
sweetened, with or without cream

Oleung - $4
sweet black iced coffee

Cafe yen - $4
sweet iced coffee with cream

Bubble teas
brewed jasmine tea shaken with milk and fruit flavours (coconut, taro, honeydew, mango, lychee, watermelon, blueberry, strawberry, raspberry, banana and thai tea) served over ice with tapioca pearls.
with pearls $6.95
without pearls $5.95

Additional Information
Add a fried egg to any dish for $2

Most dishes can be made vegetarian, ask your server

We use no MSG in our cooking

Sauces
table sauces and spices available on request:

Garlic / Hot
Sriracha Chili Sauce.

Hot
Roasted dried crushed chili peppers.

Sweet
Plum sauce.

Salty / Hot
Fish sauce with sliced fresh hot Thai chillies. Add a very small amount of the fish sauce, with as many chilies as you dare, to impart a traditional Thai salty flavour to any dish.

Hot / Sour
Sliced jalapeno peppers in vinegar sauce. Good in noodle dishes.

Peanut Sauce
Our popular homemade sauce is a little bit spicy and excellent on grilled meats.
